publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1087 Bill Butler: Parentline Scotland-That the Parliament notes the fifth birthday of Parentline Scotland, the free national helpline service offered by Children 1st, which provides confidential help for parents and has received 50,000 calls since its inception; applauds the hard work and dedication of all the staff and volunteers that provide this excellent service, and encourages more parents to take advantage of the advice and support it offers.

S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Jackie Baillie*, Rosie Kane*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Brian Adam*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mary Scanlon*, Cathie Craigie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Kate Maclean*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Paul Martin*, Michael McMahon*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Elaine Smith*, Mr David Davidson*, Eleanor Scott*, Maureen Macmillan*, Margaret Jamieson*, Patrick Harvie*, Pauline McNeill*, Marlyn Glen*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mike Pringle*, Margaret Mitchell*, Scott Barrie*, Johann Lamont*, Trish Godman*, Fiona Hyslop*, Helen Eadie*, Sarah Boyack*, Chris Ballance*, Christine May*
S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Robin Harper*, Robert Brown*, Bristow Muldoon*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S2M-1087 Bill Butler: Parentline Scotland-That the Parliament notes the fifth birthday of Parentline Scotland, the free national helpline service offered by Children 1st, which provides confidential help for parents and has received 50,000 calls since its inception; applauds the hard work and dedication of all the staff and volunteers that provide this excellent service, and encourages more parents to take advantage of the advice and support it offers. Supported by: Jackie Baillie, Rosie Kane, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mary Scanlon, Cathie Craigie, Stewart Stevenson, Kate Maclean, Ms Sandra White, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Paul Martin, Michael McMahon, Roseanna Cunningham, Elaine Smith, Mr David Davidson, Eleanor Scott, Maureen Macmillan, Margaret Jamieson, Patrick Harvie, Pauline McNeill, Marlyn Glen, Dr Elaine Murray, Mike Pringle, Margaret Mitchell, Scott Barrie, Johann Lamont, Trish Godman, Fiona Hyslop, Helen Eadie, Sarah Boyack, Chris Ballance, Christine May, Carolyn Leckie, Marilyn Livingstone, Robin Harper, Robert Brown, Bristow Muldoon, Karen Gillon, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Shiona Baird*
S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Mark Ballard*, Christine Grahame*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Karen Whitefield*, Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Dr Jean Turner*, Susan Deacon*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1087 Parentline Scotland (lodged on 23 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
